title: Soldier Character PRO Voice Pack
description: Your new video game character needs a voice. If that character happens to be a male soldier or assassin, this pack is perfect for you! You'll find hundreds of phrases to use for your creation.
longDescription:
Voice Pack Info: Male character voice-over for FPS type games, featuring Greg Dunn, professional voice talent.


You can preview the asset pack here:

https://soundcloud.com/gregory-dunn-257274948/pro-soldier-character-voice-pack-sample


This dialogue pack includes over 1100 recordings of different words and phrases for a single character. A typical use would be a Soldier or assassin in a first or third-person combat game.


There are four folders, each containing the same phrases--The difference is the intensity of their volume and attitude. Please see below for further explanation, or check out the preview video for samples. You'll also find an "Extras" folder containing added "bonus" content requested by users.


Quiet- My favorite version. These are similar to the “Whisper” pack, but with more gravitas and authority.


Shout- I would say these are best used in crazy combat situations, as the yelling can be pretty loud.


Standard- These are great for most situations. Not yelling, but not whispering either.


Whisper- These recordings are a little quieter than the rest. Good for stealthy moments. This one has a few extra sounds like Sighs and Ooohs.


Extras- Additional content that I have added in, as requested by users of this asset pack.
technicalDetails:
Technical Details

Number of Audio Waves: 1186

Number of Audio Cues: 1186

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16-bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 19+

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17PaZBY_E2v_7KDiRiq1RCgjS8edy7oz-Ph8swF-kGW8/edit?usp=sharing

Important/Additional Notes:

releaseInfo.releaseNote: Added extra dialogue phrases! New phrases are in the "Extras" folder and are updated in the files list as well.
